summary: An Ordinance granting to the Virginia Street Dock & Warehouse Company, Inc., a Corporation, its successors and assigns, a franchise to erect, maintain and operate a truss bridge across and over Railroad Avenue in the City of Seattle, Washington, from lots one (1), two (2) and three (3), Block One Hundred and Seventy-three (173) "A", Seattle Tide Lands, to lots two (2), three (3) and six (6) in Block Twenty-nine (29) A. A. Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle, for the purpose of operating a conveyor plant for the conveyance of goods, wares and merchandise.
